```{r}
i<-1

McD<-NULL
McData<-NULL
McData2<- NULL
for (i in 1:max.page){
  if(i == 1){
      McD <- google_places(search_string = loca, location = origin, radius = rad, key = key)
  }
  else{
      McD <- google_places(search_string = loca, location = origin, radius = rad, key = key, page_token = token)
  }
  token<-McD$next_page_token
  McData2<-McD$results[2]$geometry$location
  McData<-bind_rows(McData,McData2)
  Sys.sleep(3)
}

##Clean and plot coordinates
test<-McData
test[,2]<-test[,2]+90
##Adjust longitude set
##Reset radius and origin
rad <- 16100
origin <- c(44.97566,-3.2696761)

filtered_points <- test %>% 
  filter(!distm(origin, test[,], fun = distHaversine)>rad)

filtered_points %>% 
  leaflet() %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers(lat = ~lat, lng = ~lng-90)

filtered_points_90 <- cbind( lat = filtered_points[,1], lng = filtered_points[,2]-90)

##Create sub-clusters
sub_clust <- kmeans(filtered_points_90, centers = sub_clust_num)

##Create center of sub-cluster
cent_sub_clust <- kmeans(sub_clust$centers, centers = 1)

leaflet() %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addCircleMarkers(data = as.data.frame(sub_clust$centers), lat = ~lat, lng = ~lng) %>%
    addMarkers(data = as.data.frame(cent_sub_clust$centers), lat = ~lat, lng = ~lng, label = "Center")

##Waypoint calculation
i<-1
df_polyline<-NULL
colVec <- c("purple", "maroon", "green", "blue", "yellow", "olive", "black", "red")
tempMap <-leaflet() %>%
          addTiles()
for(i in 1:sub_clust_num){
  
  origin<- sub_clust$centers[i,]
  destination<- as.numeric(cent_sub_clust$centers)
##waypoints<-
  
  test.waypoints <- google_directions(origin = origin,
                          destination = destination,
                          ##waypoints = waypoints,
                          key = key)
  df_polyline[[i]] <- decode_pl(test.waypoints$routes$overview_polyline$points)
  tempMap <- addPolylines(tempMap, data = df_polyline[[i]], lat = ~lat, lng = ~lon, color = colVec[i])
}
tempMap
```
